#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main() 
{  int n,i,x,count=0,p=1,sum=1,m=1,a;
   cin>>n;
   a=n;
   if(n%2==0)
   { while(n%2==0)
     { count++;
       n/=2;
     }
     p*=count+1;
     sum*=pow(2,count+1)-1;
   }
   for(i=3;i<=sqrt(n);i+=2)
   { if(n%i==0)
     { count=0;
       while(n%i==0)
       { count++;
         n/=i;
       }
       p*=count+1;
       sum*=pow(i,count+1)-1;
       m*=(i-1);
     }
   }
   if(n>2)
   { count=1;
	 p*=count+1;
	 sum*=n+1;
   }
	cout<<sum/m-a;
	return 0;
}
